import React from'react';import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';import Card from'@material-ui/core/Card';import CardActionArea from'@material-ui/core/CardActionArea';import CardActions from'@material-ui/core/CardActions';import CardContent from'@material-ui/core/CardContent';import CardMedia from'@material-ui/core/CardMedia';import Button from'@material-ui/core/Button';import Typography from'@material-ui/core/Typography';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var useStyles=makeStyles({root:{maxWidth:345},media:{height:140}});var ProductCard=function ProductCard(props){var product=props.product;var classes=useStyles();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:classes.root,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardActionArea,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardMedia,{className:classes.media,image:product.img_url,title:"Contemplative Reptile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{gutterBottom:true,variant:"h5",component:"h2",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"textSecondary",component:"p",children:product.artist})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",color:"primary",children:"Purchase"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"small",color:"primary",children:"Learn More"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",color:"textSecondary",component:"p",children:product.price})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
